description.value: Whether by fluke, the whims of fate, or deep-seated fear of codependency, you can't form a permanent partner bond. Instead, you can form a temporary partner bond. The time it takes you to form a partner bond is reduced to 10 minutes, and the duration of this partner bond is reduced to 1 day. You can choose to sever a partner bond early as a single action that has the concentration trait. If you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Transfer Vitality] to your partner, reduce the Hit Point cost by 1 plus 1 for every 4 levels you have (to a minimum of 1).
